Class PostnetEncoder

java.lang.Object
PostnetEncoder
public class PostnetEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
Class to encode a ZIP, ZIP+4, or ZIP+4+Delivery Code into the POSTNET barcode standard.
Version:
1.0.0, 8 Sept 2020
Author:
cjsindt

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.lang.String barEncoding
    The POSTNET bar encoding of the zip code
    private static java.lang.String[] barEncodingChart
    Conversion chart from decimal to bars based on index
    private java.lang.String binaryEncoding
    The POSTNET binary encoding of the zip code
    private static java.lang.String[] binaryEncodingChart
    Conversion chart from decimal to binary based on index
    private java.lang.String zipCode
    The zipcode to encode into the POSTNET standard

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    PostnetEncoder()
    Default Constructor with no parameters
    PostnetEncoder​(java.lang.String zip)
    Constructor that takes a Zip Code as a parameter with hyphens separating the ZIP from the +4 and Delivery code and encodes it into a POSTNET bar code

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void encodeZipCode​(java.lang.String zip)
    Encodes the ZipCode into it's Binary and POSTNET representations

    Returns the POSTNET barcode of the Zip Code

    Returns the binary encoding of the Zip Code
    java.lang.String getZipCode()
    Returns the Zip Code.
    static boolean isValidZip​(java.lang.String zip)
    Checks if zip is a valid zip code format.
    void setZipCode​(java.lang.String zip)
    Sets the Zip code to zip if given a valid zip code

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • PostnetEncoder

      public PostnetEncoder()
      Default Constructor with no parameters

    • PostnetEncoder

      public PostnetEncoder​(java.lang.String zip)
      Constructor that takes a Zip Code as a parameter with hyphens separating the ZIP from the +4 and Delivery code and encodes it into a POSTNET bar code
      Parameters:
      zip - The Zip Code (ZIP, ZIP+4, ZIP+4+Delivery Code)

  • Method Details

    • setZipCode

      public void setZipCode​(java.lang.String zip)
      Sets the Zip code to zip if given a valid zip code
      Parameters:
      zip - The Zip Code (ZIP, ZIP+4, ZIP+4+Delivery Code)

    • getZipCode

      public java.lang.String getZipCode()
      Returns the Zip Code.

    • getBarEncoding

      public java.lang.String getBarEncoding()
      Returns the POSTNET barcode of the Zip Code
      Returns:
      The POSTNET barcode of the Zip Code

    • isValidZip

      public static boolean isValidZip​(java.lang.String zip)
      Checks if zip is a valid zip code format. Either ZIP, ZIP+4, or ZIP+4+Delivery Code i.e. 55555 / 55555-1234 / 55555-1234-99
      Parameters:
      zip - The Zip Code
      Returns:
      true if the zip code is valid, false otherwise

    • encodeZipCode

      private void encodeZipCode​(java.lang.String zip)
      Encodes the ZipCode into it's Binary and POSTNET representations
      Parameters:
      zip - the zip code
